resources.string: How do you split up or assign roles?
Do you have assigned leads? If so what are they?
Do you have a video production team? If so what editing software do you use?
What are your main ways of gaining sponsors?
Do you have fundraisers? If so what are they?
What do you do for team sustainability?
What are you currently doing for imagery? Is it team specific or season specific?
How do you gain and/or maintain mentors?
Do you host any events or projects during offseason/summer?
What is your main way of gaining and keeping new members?
